title: Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Finale
title_jp: 乃木坂春香の秘密 ふぃな～れ♪
synopsis: Yuuto and Haruka are looking forward to spending time together on a school trip. However, Shina finally works up the nerve to tell Yuuto she has feelings for him. This event drives a wedge between Haruka and Yuuto and forces them to confront how they feel.
